workflow-instructions.name: business-model-design
workflow-instructions.overview: Design the venture's business model in Phase 6 (Week 10). Run a business model exploration exercise to compare 5+ options, select the best fit, and then build the Business Model Canvas, pricing model, and monetisation plan.

step.name: business-model-exploration
step.title: Business Model Exploration
step.instructions:
Run the "business-model-exploration" brainstorming technique from brainstorming-techniques.csv. Load icp-profile.md, wedge-definition.md, and value-proposition.md.
Generate 5+ distinct business model options: 1. SaaS / Subscription — recurring per seat or company 2. Usage-based — pay per use / transaction 3. Freemium — free tier + paid upgrade 4. Marketplace — % take on transactions 5. Data / API monetisation — license data or provide API access 6. Professional services + software — hybrid 7. Platform / ecosystem — others build on us
For each: describe the model, estimate revenue potential, assess CAC implications, implementation complexity, and fit with mothership assets. Present comparison matrix. Ask user (in Guided mode) to select or narrow to 1-2 options for full development.

step.name: business-model-canvas
step.title: Business Model Canvas
step.instructions: Using the selected business model and the business-model-canvas.md template, complete the full BMC: - Customer Segments, Value Propositions, Channels, Customer Relationships - Revenue Streams, Key Resources, Key Activities, Key Partnerships, Cost Structure Include unit economics summary: ACV, Gross Margin, LTV, CAC, LTV:CAC ratio, Payback Period.

step.name: pricing-model
step.title: Pricing Model
step.instructions: Using the pricing-model.md template: 1. Select pricing strategy (value-based / cost-plus / competitor-anchored / freemium / usage-based) 2. Design pricing tiers (2-3 tiers typical) 3. Set pricing mechanics (billing frequency, seat/company/usage-based) 4. Research willingness to pay (from interviews + competitor pricing via web search) 5. Design a pricing validation experiment (landing page A/B, customer interview, pilot pricing) 6. Calculate revenue implications per tier
step.template-output: Save pricing model with tiers and validation plan.

step.name: monetisation-plan
step.title: Monetisation Plan
step.instructions:
Using the monetisation-plan.md template: 1. Define primary revenue stream (detail: mechanism, ACV, gross margin, timeline to revenue) 2. Define 2 secondary revenue streams (diversification) 3. Revenue diversification assessment — no stream should be >70% by Year 3 4. Create monetisation timeline (first revenue, break-even, ARR milestones) 5. Unit economics by stream 6. Monetisation risks and experiments to validate
Update venture-state.yaml: completed_artifacts, guiding_questions.design_business
